text: Behtar hai ki hamāre buzurg pūrī jamāt kī numāindagī kareṅ. Phir jitne bhī ādmiyoṅ kī Ġhairyahūdī bīwiyāṅ haiṅ wuh ek muqarrarā din maqāmī buzurgoṅ aur qāziyoṅ ko sāth le kar yahāṅ āeṅ aur muāmalā durust kareṅ. Aur lāzim hai ki yih silsilā us waqt tak jārī rahe jab tak Rab kā ġhazab ṭhanḍā na ho jāe.”
